title: SAP Migration to AWS and Azure: Heterogeneous System Copy, Database Migration, and Cloud Transformation
description: Master SAP migration strategies by executing complex migrations from on-premises to AWS using various migration methods, tools, and patterns, then implementing equivalent migration approaches on Azure with comprehensive assessment, planning, and execution.
certificationWeight: 25% - Migration of SAP Workloads to AWS Domain
prerequisites: Deep understanding of SAP system architecture
Familiarity with cloud migration tools and patterns
learningObjectives: Plan and assess SAP migration to cloud platforms
Execute homogeneous and heterogeneous system copies
Perform SAP database migrations with minimal downtime
Implement SAP-specific migration tools and techniques
Design hybrid connectivity for phased migrations
Execute migration validation and cutover procedures

businessScenario.description: EnterpriseRetailCorp needs to migrate their complete SAP landscape including ECC 6.0, BW/4HANA, and multiple SAP applications from on-premises data centers to cloud, involving 50TB of data, 200+ interfaces, with maximum 4-hour downtime window.
requirements: Migrate SAP ECC 6.0 (15TB) to cloud infrastructure

sections.title: Migration Assessment and Planning
sections.content: Conduct comprehensive SAP migration assessment with discovery, analysis, and detailed planning.

hands-on.aws:
1. Deploy AWS Application Discovery Service
2. Use SAP Migration Evaluator for TCO analysis
3. Assess with SAP Readiness Check
4. Create migration wave planning
5. Design target architecture on AWS
6. Plan network connectivity strategy
7. Develop migration runbook
hands-on.azure:
1. Deploy Azure Migrate for SAP discovery
2. Use Azure TCO Calculator for SAP
3. Run SAP assessment tools
4. Create phased migration strategy
5. Design target Azure architecture
6. Plan ExpressRoute connectivity
7. Develop detailed migration plan

sections.title: Database Migration Strategies
sections.content: Implement various SAP database migration techniques including homogeneous and heterogeneous migrations.

hands-on.aws:
1. Configure SAP Database Migration Option (DMO)
2. Set up AWS DMS for SAP databases
3. Implement SAP HANA System Replication
4. Configure backup/restore migration
5. Execute R3load export/import
6. Perform SUM with DMO
7. Validate database consistency
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure DMO for Azure migration
2. Set up Azure DMS for SAP
3. Implement HSR to Azure
4. Configure Azure Backup migration
5. Execute heterogeneous system copy
6. Perform SUM DMO migration
7. Validate data integrity

sections.title: Application Server Migration
sections.content: Migrate SAP application servers using various techniques including lift-and-shift and re-platforming.

hands-on.aws:
1. Use CloudEndure for server replication
2. Configure EC2 Image Builder
3. Implement blue-green deployment
4. Migrate SAP kernel and profiles
5. Update SAP system configuration
6. Reconfigure SAP work processes
7. Validate application functionality
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure Azure Site Recovery
2. Use Azure Image Builder
3. Implement staged migration
4. Migrate SAP executables
5. Update system profiles
6. Configure SAP on Azure VMs
7. Perform application testing

sections.title: Data Transfer and Synchronization
sections.content: Implement large-scale data transfer strategies with minimal downtime and continuous synchronization.

hands-on.aws:
1. Configure AWS DataSync for file transfer
2. Set up AWS Snow devices for large data
3. Implement Direct Connect for transfer
4. Configure incremental data sync
5. Set up database log shipping
6. Implement change data capture
7. Validate data completeness
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure Azure File Sync
2. Deploy Azure Data Box
3. Set up ExpressRoute transfer
4. Implement differential sync
5. Configure log shipping to Azure
6. Set up data replication
7. Verify data integrity

sections.title: System Integration and Interfaces
sections.content: Migrate and reconfigure SAP integrations, interfaces, and middleware components.

hands-on.aws:
1. Reconfigure RFC connections
2. Update SAP PI/PO endpoints
3. Migrate SAP Web Dispatcher
4. Update external system connections
5. Reconfigure SSO and authentication
6. Update firewall and routing rules
7. Test all integration points
hands-on.azure:
1. Update RFC destinations
2. Reconfigure integration endpoints
3. Migrate load balancer settings
4. Update connection strings
5. Configure Azure AD integration
6. Update network security rules
7. Validate all interfaces

sections.title: Cutover and Go-Live Procedures
sections.content: Execute production cutover with detailed procedures, validation, and rollback strategies.

hands-on.aws:
1. Execute pre-cutover validation
2. Perform final data synchronization
3. Update DNS and routing
4. Execute cutover runbook
5. Perform smoke testing
6. Validate system performance
7. Implement rollback if needed
hands-on.azure:
1. Run cutover readiness checks
2. Complete final data sync
3. Switch traffic to Azure
4. Execute go-live procedures
5. Perform validation testing
6. Monitor system metrics
7. Execute rollback plan if required

hands-onExercises.title: Execute Complete SAP ECC Migration
hands-onExercises.description: Perform end-to-end migration of SAP ECC system from on-premises to cloud with minimal downtime.
tasks: Assess current SAP landscape and dependencies

hands-onExercises.title: Implement SAP HANA Migration with HSR
hands-onExercises.description: Migrate SAP HANA database using System Replication with near-zero downtime.
tasks: Set up HANA System Replication to cloud

commonIssues.issue: Database migration taking longer than maintenance window
commonIssues.solution: Implement parallel export/import, optimize network bandwidth, use incremental migration approach
Optimize instance sizing, configure proper storage IOPS, tune SAP parameters for cloud
Update all connection endpoints, reconfigure firewalls, validate certificate chains
Implement proper change freeze, use consistent backup points, validate with SAP tools

skillsValidation: Can plan and assess SAP migrations comprehensively
Can execute various database migration techniques
Can migrate SAP application servers with minimal downtime
Can handle large-scale data transfers efficiently
